mapper.insert: insert into user (uid, name, salt, password, email, phone, gender, avatar, signup_at, address) values (#{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signupAt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update user set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, signup_at = #{signupAt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select uid, name, salt, password, email, phone, gender, avatar, signup_at, address from user
